title: Fins' Hill dislocates knee, tears ACL, ligaments
content: Dolphins wide receiver Tyreek Hill dislocated his knee during Monday night's game and tore multiple ligaments, including his ACL, according to coach Mike McDaniel.

title: Collier blasts WNBA's Engelbert: 'Worst leadership'
content: Lynx star Napheesa Collier said the WNBA has the "worst leadership" and accused commissioner Cathy Engelbert of being "negligent" in her governance.

title: Wild ink Kaprizov to largest contact in NHL history
content: The Wild have signed left wing Kirill Kaprizov to an NHL-record eight-year, $136 million contract extension through the 2033-34 season.

title: Sauce: Refs picking on me because Jets losing
content: Star cornerback Sauce Gardner believes the officials are picking on him, and he claimed it's because the Jets are a losing team.

title: Texas' Miller gets first commit in top-50 Ogden
content: Coach Sean Miller landed his first recruit since taking over as Texas coach, in small forward Bo Ogden, whose father, Chris, is GM at Texas.

title: '28 Women's Final Four moving to Colts' stadium
content: The NCAA's decision to move the 2028 Women's Final Four to Lucas Oil Stadium instead of Gainbridge Fieldhouse will add approximately 13,000 seats.

title: Poirier wants to face Diaz in boxing: 'I'd do it'
content: Dustin Poirier, who retired from the UFC in July, posted on social media early Tuesday in an appeal to Zuffa Boxing that he would fight Nate Diaz in boxing.

title: Guardians promote top prospect for Tigers series
content: Outfielder Chase DeLauter, who has yet to make his major league debut, was added to the Guardians' roster for their wild-card series against the Tigers.

title: ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π Tyreek Hill injury FAQ: Recovery timetable
content: What is the Dolphins WR's outlook for a dislocated knee, the on-field impact of his absence and his future in Miami.

title: How one city‚Äôs tragedy birthed a standard for a championship years in the making
content: For 30 years, the Oklahoma City bombing -- the most devastating act of homegrown terrorism in history -- has been seared into the identity of the city. Since 2008, the Thunder have been trying to honor it -- and give the fans a new one.

title: 'There is a personal side of it all:' How NFL QBs and refs approach their in-game chats
content: Aaron Rodgers is 'humorous.' Patrick Mahomes wants to be informed. Here's what QBs and refs say about their conversations.

title: Ranking the 10 best moments from the Yankees-Red Sox rivalry
content: From Bucky Dent to Aaron Boone and everything between, here are the hottest moments from MLB's most storied rivalry.

content: Putting the spotlight on select teams and questions around others as the early playoff picture takes shape.

content: Who should be the next captain for Team USA? How can Scottie Scheffler turn around his Ryder Cup record? We answer some of the biggest questions facing the U.S. ahead of 2027.

title: How Europe backed up Rory McIlroy's words and won the Ryder Cup on the road
content: Two years ago in Rome, McIlroy predicted a win at Bethpage. Europe's gutsy team play made it come true.

title: Why Karim L√≥pez looms as Mexico's first NBA star
content: The Sonora teenager is poised to become the first Mexican-born player to be drafted in the NBA's first round, a feat that would lift his local celebrity to unlimited heights.

title: Here's who our experts pick to win every round of the 2025 MLB playoffs
content: Which will be the last team standing in October? Our MLB experts predict which teams will win each series of the postseason.

title: Post-Ducks crashout, how Trevor Zegras can recapture the 'magic' with the Flyers
content: The cover athlete from EA Sports' NHL 23 hit a wall in Anaheim, but gets a reset after a trade to Philly.

title: Pickups: Replacing Malik Nabers, surprising RB options
content: Highlighting available free agent options after a weekend of surprising performances ahead of Week 5.

title: How the Lynx's yearlong pursuit of WNBA title ended early in the semifinals
content: Since a runner-up finish a year ago, the Lynx focused on winning it all in 2025. Instead, they're out in the semis.

title: Oregon in OT? Virginia's stunner? Bama's redemption? Ranking best games of Week 5ÔªøÔªø
content: The heavyweight battles brought the goods, but there were even more thrillers. We rank Week 5's games.

title: Is the original Bloodline's return imminent?
content: Roman Reigns joined The Usos at Raw. It was his first time in a WWE ring since being stretchered off at Clash of Paris in August.

title: 'Don't you talk s--- about Steven Seagal': MMA stars rank Hollywood actors as fighters
content: ESPN assembled a panel of MMA experts to determine which Hollywood stars would win a UFC-style event.

title: Tracking MLB offseason manager changes: Bochy out in Texas, Baldelli and Melvin also out
content: The offseason carousel starts with openings in San Francisco, Minnesota and Texas. Here's who is out -- and who could be in line to replace them.

title: Caitlin Clark fuels women's memorabilia market growth
content: Sports collectibles industry experts say interest in Caitlin Clark cards is leading to growth in the women's memorabilia market overall, particularly for the WNBA.

title: Revisiting every big transfer from this summer: Should our expectations be dialed back?
content: This summer had its share of blockbuster moves, but how have they panned out so far? Do we need to scale back our expectations of these players -- or expect even more?

title: Ruben Amorim running out of excuses: The numbers don't lie
content: Soccer management is ultimately a numbers game, and none of them are adding up for Man United's manager.

title: Inside the odds of the Guardians' remarkable comeback to win the AL Central
content: From 10.5 games back on September 1 to division champions, the Guardians defied the odds to overtake the Tigers.

title: College football betting: Buckeyes, Ducks the favorites for national title, Heisman
content: As the odds shift for the Heisman Trophy and national championship, Pamela Maldonado explains how to bet them.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool and Man United could vie for Carlos Baleba
content: Liverpool and Manchester United could go head to head over Brighton's Carlos Baleba. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Andrew Nembhard, Brandon Miller among top middle-round targets
content: Building a championship-caliber roster means finding solid contributors after the early rounds of your draft. Here are eight to focus on.

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: 'Took orders from US': BJP lashes out after Chidambaram's big 26/11 admission
content: The Bhartiya Janta Party criticized former union home minister P Chidambaram. He recently stated the UPA government did not retaliate after the 26/11 Mumbai attacks. Chidambaram mentioned foreign pressure influenced this decision. The BJP accused the Congress of mishandling the situation. They questioned the UPA's accountability regarding the terror incident. This sparked a political debate.

title: Pumped & dumped Pak back in US favour: Trump praises Munir; recycles claims
content: US President Donald Trump reiterated his claim of averting nuclear war between India and Pakistan, praising Pakistani leaders for their gratitude. He also repeated unsubstantiated claims of seven downed planes. Trump's admiration for Pakistan's "Field Marshal" and their Middle-East peace plan support signals renewed US-Pakistan ties, despite some analysts' caution.

title: 'Enemy within': Trump threatens US generals; tells military to quell civil unrest
content: US President Donald Trump threatened to fire military leaders he disliked. He declared a 'war from within' against crime and immigration. Trump warned the military would assist in crackdowns on Democratic-run cities. He ordered a quick reaction force for civil disturbances. Pentagon chief Pete Hegseth criticized 'woke' policies. Hegseth mandated fitness tests and new grooming standards for all military personnel. He stressed the need for fit officers.

title: China alarm: Ex-Google CEO Schmidt to US tech firms; ‚ÄòYou‚Äôre up against 996‚Äô
content: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt warns US tech companies that remote work jeopardizes their competitiveness against China's intense "996" culture. He argues it hinders young employees' development and prioritizes work-life balance over winning. Google itself is tightening remote policies, with co-founder Sergey Brin even pushing for 60-hour weeks for AI teams, highlighting the escalating tech race.

title: Pakistan: 9 killed in blasts in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa; probe on
content: Nine people died in two bomb incidents in South Waziristan. Five villagers were killed by a road bomb. Four militants died when their device exploded early. Separately, a car bomb in Quetta killed ten people. This incident follows a recent suicide bombing in the same city. Authorities are investigating these events.

title: Shahid Afridi calls on Naqvi to step down over lack of cricket knowledge
content: Mohsin Naqvi is under pressure to relinquish one of his dual roles as PCB Chairman or Interior Minister following the Asia Cup controversy and Pakistan's poor performance. Shahid Afridi has urged him to choose, emphasizing the need for dedicated leadership and competent cricket advisers to address the sport's challenges effectively.

title: Trump announces Pfizer price cuts for Medicaid; $70 billion investment promised
content: Pfizer agreed to lower prescription drug costs for Medicaid and invest $70 billion in US manufacturing, President Trump announced. This deal includes most-favoured-nation pricing for Medicaid, aiming to significantly reduce healthcare expenses. Pfizer's shares surged following the announcement, which precedes new US tariffs on branded drugs.

title: JPMorgan fraud: 32-year-old CEO duped US largest bank of $175mn; sentenced for 7 yrs
content: Charlie Javice, founder of Frank, was sentenced to seven years in jail for defrauding JPMorgan Chase of $175 million. She was convicted of faking over 4 million customers to facilitate the sale of her fintech startup. The judge highlighted her duplicity while also criticizing JPMorgan's inadequate due diligence during the acquisition.

title: Bihar SIR in numbers: Final list out; what to do if your name is not on list
content: The Election Commission of India released Bihar's final voter list, revealing a significant increase to 7.42 crore electors after the Special Intensive Revision. This process involved deleting ineligible voters and adding 21.53 lakh eligible ones, with Patna alone gaining 1.63 lakh voters. Eligible citizens can still apply for inclusion or appeal decisions.

title: 'Nothing is inevitable': Trump says US will 'probably have a shutdown'
content: The US government is on the brink of a shutdown, with President Trump blaming Democrats for stalled funding talks. A partisan standoff over healthcare and spending puts thousands of federal workers at risk. Senate Democrats refuse to pass a House measure without an extension of healthcare benefits, while Trump insists on a "clean" bill.

title: Macho America's message to enemies: FAFO
content: President Trump and "War Secretary" Hegseth unveiled a new "peace through strength" doctrine to military leaders, emphasizing aggression and rejecting "wokeness" and diversity. Trump declared war on an "enemy within," while Hegseth promoted machismo and strict new rules, including a ban on beards, impacting Sikh service members.

title: Accenture layoffs: CEO says ‚Äòwe are exiting" employees we can't retrain
content: Accenture has reportedly laid off thousands of employees this year, citing their inability to be retrained in AI skills, as it reshapes its workforce for the AI era. The company is simultaneously expanding its AI capabilities and plans to increase headcount, reflecting a broader industry trend of adapting to AI or facing obsolescence.

title: Karur stampede: TN govt counters Vijay's charges; releases videos of rally
content: The probe into the Karur stampede has escalated into a blame game between the Tamil Nadu government and TVK chief Vijay. DMK leaders released videos alleging TVK cadres broke cordons and chose an unsuitable venue, leading to overcrowding and a surge. They claim organizers ignored police warnings. Vijay, however, accused CM Stalin of vendetta, challenging him while defending his party.

title: China K visa vs US H-1B: Will Trump‚Äôs policies push talent to China? Explained
content: China's new K visa, effective October 1, 2025, targets young global STEM graduates, offering entry and work authorization without prior job offers. This initiative in a way counters the US's stricter H-1B policies, including a $100,000 fee hike, potentially attracting Indian professionals.

title: Asia Cup: BCCI demands trophy during heated ACC meet; Naqvi 'beats around bush'
content: During an Asian Cricket Council (ACC) meeting in Dubai, attended by BCCI representatives Rajeev Shukla and Ashish Shelar, ACC chair Mohsin Naqvi avoided committing to handing over the Asia Cup trophy to India. This indicates an unresolved matter concerning the trophy's presentation to the Indian team.

title: Gabrielle Union on Dwyane Wade: Fear of raising kids alone amid cancer
content: Gabrielle Union revealed her biggest fear when Dwyane Wade was diagnosed with kidney cancer, admitting she worried about raising their children alone. His secrecy regarding his health decisions caused distrust, nearly bringing their marriage to rock bottom. Wade underwent surgery in December 2023 to remove 40% of his right kidney.

title: Who is Jason Taylor‚Äôs wife? Meet Monica Taylor of MNF ‚ÄòColdplay Moment
content: Former Dolphins star Jason Taylor had a viral 'Coldplay Moment' during Monday Night Football when cameras caught his wife Monica moving off his lap, sparking widespread laughter. This relatable interaction highlighted the human side of the NFL Hall of Famer, also showcasing Monica's impressive career as an entrepreneur and philanthropist.

title: Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs wife Celeste Desjardins relives dream wedding day
content: NHL superstar Leon Draisaitl and Celeste Desjardins celebrated their dream wedding in a stunning French chateau, sharing exclusive glimpses online. Celeste called it ‚Äúthe happiest day of our lives,‚Äù showcasing a blend of romance, luxury, and intimate moments with family and NHL friends. This personal milestone revealed Draisaitl's devotion beyond the ice, captivating fans with its heartfelt elegance.

title: Happy Gandhi Jayanti 2025: 50 wishes & messages and quotes to share on Whatsapp
content: Gandhi Jayanti reminds us that peace, non-violence and truth are values we should embrace throughout our lives. By sharing wishes, messages, and quotes, we not only honor Mahatma Gandhi but also inspire others to follow his path. This article provides the top 50 wishes, messages, and quotes to make this day memorable.

title: 'You have 3-4 days': Trump's ultimatum to Hamas on Gaza deal; warns of 'sad end'
content: US President Donald Trump issued a 3-4 day ultimatum for Hamas to accept a Gaza peace proposal, co-presented with Israeli PM Netanyahu. The plan demands Hamas disarm in exchange for a ceasefire, aid, and reconstruction, with Trump warning of severe consequences for refusal. Hamas stated it will study the internationally backed proposal before responding.

title: EU summit: US to send anti-drone defences to Denmark; Zelenskyy deploys 'specialists'
content: The United States and several European nations are sending anti-drone defenses to Denmark ahead of an EU summit, following alleged Russian drone sightings over Danish airports and military sites. Ukraine is also deploying specialists to share its expertise, aiming to build a "Drone Wall" across Europe. Denmark has heightened security and closed airspace to civilian drones.

title: Tyreek Hill injury update: Gruesome details worry Miami Dolphins fans
content: Tyreek Hill‚Äôs season is over after a devastating knee injury in the Miami Dolphins‚Äô win over the New York Jets. The star receiver dislocated his left knee and tore multiple ligaments, including his ACL, according to ESPN‚Äôs Adam Schefter. Hill faces surgery and a long recovery, leaving Dolphins fans gutted and the team‚Äôs Super Bowl hopes in serious doubt.

title: Caught on camera: Man sprints out of ground with Asia Cup trophy - watch
content: Pakistan Cricket Board chairman Mohsin Naqvi faced widespread criticism after India's Asia Cup victory. The post-match presentation turned chaotic as Indian players refused to accept the winner's trophy from Naqvi, also ACC chairman. Fans booed Naqvi, chanting "Bharat Mata Ki Jai.

title: 'I Love Muhammad' row: Accused held after encounter; properties marked for demolition
content: Bareilly Police arrested key accused Tazim following violent clashes over the 'I Love Muhammad' campaign. Tazim, a known cattle smuggler, fired at officers during his arrest; a weapon was recovered. Seventy-two people are now in custody, and ten FIRs have been filed.

title: 'Fat generals': Hegseth sets new norms for US military; slams 'woke' culture
content: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth convened a secret meeting at Quantico to unveil sweeping directives, including implementing gender-neutral physical fitness standards and eliminating "woke" culture from the military. He emphasized physical fitness, reformed personnel records, and warned dissenting leaders to resign, drawing scrutiny for the meeting's urgency and secrecy amid broader military changes.

title: 'Truth will come out': TVK's Vijay on Karur stampede; big message for CM Stalin
content: TVK chief Vijay expressed deep pain over the Karur stampede that killed 41, questioning the FIR against his party leaders and asking if CM Stalin was seeking revenge. He claimed to have requested police for a safe tour location and challenged the Chief Minister, stating he is ready for any action.

title: Rajvir Jawanda remains in 'critical condition': Hospital confirms no improvement
content: Punjabi singer Rajvir Jawanda remains in critical condition, four days after his tragic road accident near Baddi. Currently on life support at Fortis Hospital, Mohali, his neurological state shows minimal brain activity with no significant improvement. The Punjabi entertainment fraternity and fans, along with political leaders, continue to pray and hope for his speedy recovery.

title: Three family members of 'Meet the Putmans' pass away in a tragic car accident
content: Three members of the 'Meet the Putmans' reality show family, Bill 'Papa' Putman, Barb 'Neenee' Putman, and Megan, died in a Michigan car crash. A semi-truck reportedly failed to stop at a stop sign, causing the collision. Five other family members were hospitalized with injuries, with Noah sedated and Gia recovering from a craniotomy, as authorities continue their investigation.

title: 'Pakistan came hard at us': Tilak Varma breaks silence on verbal assault
content: Middle-order batter Tilak Varma revealed how he handled intense sledging from Pakistan players during his match-winning 69* in the Asia Cup final. He stated his unbeaten knock was the "best reply" to their aggression, emphasising his focus on country and basics under pressure. Varma aims for the T20 World Cup, crediting his coaches for his success.

title: Bihar SIR: Final electoral roll out; 21.53 lakh electors added
content: The Election Commission released Bihar's final voter list, showing a significant increase in electors after a Special Intensive Revision. This process, which included a drive to remove illegal migrants, faces Supreme Court scrutiny and opposition allegations of irregularities. The EC, however, maintains its impartiality amidst the controversy.

title: Taylor Swift wedding speech: Selena beat me to the altar with Kelce
content: Taylor Swift marriage with Travis Kelce rumors heat up after the singer joked about weddings during her emotional speech at Selena Gomez and Benny Blanco‚Äôs Santa Barbara ceremony. With fresh $1.7M renovations to her Rhode Island mansion and Watch Hill‚Äôs reputation for privacy, fans think the seaside town could host one of pop culture‚Äôs most anticipated weddings.

title: 'Desh ke liye jaan de dunga; Pak is no competition': Tilak Varma
content: Tilak Varma affirmed captain Suryakumar Yadav's stance that Pakistan is no competition, revealing he felt immense pressure but prioritized the nation during the Asia Cup 2025 final. His match-winning 69* off 53 balls was pivotal in India's five-wicket triumph over Pakistan, securing the title after a dramatic chase.

title: Delhi molestation case: 'Godman' shows no remorse; chats, pics found on phone
content: Self-styled godman Chaitanyanand Saraswati, 62, faces sexual harassment allegations from 17 students, with his two female aides accused of threatening victims and deleting evidence. Arrested in Agra, Saraswati shows no remorse and remains uncooperative, despite police finding incriminating chats and photos on his devices during the ongoing investigation.

title: Why the liver can‚Äôt always heal itself after quitting alcohol, scientists explain
content: New research reveals why alcohol-damaged livers cannot heal themselves. Liver cells get stuck in a repair limbo, unable to fully regenerate. RNA splicing problems and a missing protein, ESRP2, prevent tissue regrowth. Inflammation further suppresses ESRP2. These findings could lead to new treatments for alcohol-related liver disease, providing alternatives to transplants.

title: Happy Maha Navami 2025: 75+ wishes, messages, greetings, quotes & images
content: Maha Navami is celebrated with mixed emotions, blending the joy of invoking Goddess Durga as Siddhidatri with the bittersweet awareness of her impending departure. Devotees cherish each moment, recognizing the transient nature of celebration while embracing the strength to overcome challenges. This sacred day inspires courage and reminds us that great things lie ahead after hard struggles.

title: Small Savings Schemes: Latest interest rates announced - check list
content: Good news for small savers! The government has maintained unchanged interest rates for Post Office Small Savings Schemes for October to December 2025. Key schemes like PPF (7.1%), NSC (7.7%), SCSS (8.2%), and Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (8.2%) continue to offer stable returns.

title: 'Gold rush' for India? Trump's H-1B move falls flat; US may lose high-value jobs
content: Donald Trump's H-1B visa fee increase to $100,000, intended to safeguard US jobs, is reportedly backfiring. US companies are now accelerating the shift of high-value work, including AI and product development, to India's booming Global Capability Centers. This move could turbocharge India's rise as a global innovation hub, despite potential future tax hurdles.

title: 'Dedicate to PAK Air Force': Afridi, Yunus reveal plan had India lost final
content: India clinched the 2025 Asia Cup crown against Pakistan, but the post-match statements garnered equal attention. Indian captain Suryakumar Yadav donated his match fees to the Indian Army, while Pakistan skipper Salman Ali Agha responded by donating his team's fees to civilians affected by an "Indian attack." However, Shahid Afridi has now revealed that the plan was to dedicate the win to the Pakistan Army had their side won in the final.

title: Woman who lost 35 kilos shares 3 tips that helped her lose weight
content: Weight loss does not always have to be a herculean task. Snigdha Baruah, who successfully shed 35 kg, shares three straightforward weight loss tips, emphasizing that fancy diets or complex workouts are unnecessary. She recommends simple strength training paired with steady-state cardio like daily steps. Additionally, Baruah advises against cutting carbs, instead focusing on portion control, and highlights the crucial role of 7-9 hours of quality sleep for recovery. Take a look.

title: 'Board of Peace': What is Tony Blair's role in Trump's Gaza peace plan?
content: US President Donald Trump unveiled a 20-point Gaza peace plan, proposing a ceasefire, hostage release, and a "New Gaza" governed by a technocratic Palestinian committee. Trump would chair a "Board of Peace" with Tony Blair to oversee redevelopment.

title: Draymond Green to LeBron James: Stern message ahead of NBA season
content: Draymond Green created a stir at the Warriors media day. He jokingly stated LeBron James should not have a podcast. Green later admitted this was a playful jab at the Lakers star. James already co-hosts a popular show. This incident adds excitement to the upcoming Warriors-Lakers season opener. Green also shared his goal for a tenth All-Defensive selection.

title: Ex UP Minister Gayatri Prajapati Hit With Part Of Cupboard In Jail, Hospitalised
content: Former state minister Gayatri Prajapati was hospitalised on Tuesday after an inmate attacked him in the Lucknow jail.

title: Crime Against Children Recorded 9.2% Rise In 2023: Data
content: A total of 1,77,335 cases of crime against children were registered in the country in 2023, showing an increase of 9.2 per cent over 2022, according to the latest NCRB report.

title: Over 21,000 Killed In Rail Accidents In 2023: Data
content: As many as 21,803 people were killed in 24,678 railway accidents in the country in 2023 with Maharashtra and Uttar Pradesh reporting the highest fatalities, according to a report of the National Crime Records Bureau.

title: "Allegations False": TVK Leaders Named In Stampede Case Seek Pre-Arrest Bail
content: Three days after the Karur stampede that killed 41, two senior TVK functionaries General Secretary Bussy Anand and Joint General Secretary C.T. Nirmal Kumarhave approached the Madurai Bench of the Madras High Court seeking anticipatory bail.

title: "Cruise Setting Won't Do": Air Marshal On Operationalisation Delays
content: Deputy Chief of the Air Staff, Air Marshal Awadhesh Kumar Bharti, on Tuesday stressed that India's defence sector is making significant strides towards self-reliance, with the Indian Air Force (IAF) actively pursuing indigenous projects.

title: Tamil Nadu Govt Issues Point-By-Point Rebuttal To TVK Over Karur Stampede Allegations
content: The Tamil Nadu government gave a point-by-point rebuttal to the TVK's charges of administrative failure in handling the rally that killed 41.

title: Weather Office Warns Of 'Above-Normal' Rain In India For October
content: India is expected to receive 15 per cent more rainfall than normal in October, following bountiful rains during the four-month monsoon season, the India Meteorological Department (IMD) said on Tuesday.

title: 'Op Sindoor Living Example': Rajnath Singh On Tri-Services Synergy
content: The tri-services synergy with unified real-time operational coherence demonstrated during Operation Sindoor was a "living example" of delivering decisive results and it must become the benchmark for all future military actions, Rajnath Singh said

title: PM Modi To Attend RSS Centenary Event Tomorrow; Will Release Postage Stamp, Coin
content: PM Modi will release a specially designed commemorative postage stamp and a coin highlighting the RSS' contribution to the nation at a programme here on Wednesday to mark the centenary celebrations of the Hindutva organisation.

title: Man Misbehaves With Woman, UP MLA On Delhi-Lucknow Flight, Charged
content: Uttar Pradesh MLA Rakesh Pratap Singh confronted an abusive man on a Delhi-Lucknow flight and filed a police case, leading to the man's arrest.

title: RSS To Be Part Of Curriculum In Delhi Schools Soon
content: Students in Delhi government schools will soon study the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) alongside freedom fighters under a new educational initiative called Rashtriya Niti, officials said.

title: Adani Green Energy Operationalises 408 Megawatts Of Projects In Gujarat's Khavda
content: Adani Green Energy Ltd (AGEL) on Tuesday announced it has operationalised 408 MW of power projects at Khavda in Gujarat.

title: Trump Says Him Not Winning Nobel Prize Would Be 'Insult' To America
content: US President Donald Trump said Tuesday it would be an "insult" to the United States if he does not receive the Nobel Peace Prize.

title: US Orders "Male-Level" Fitness, Ends "Woke" Rules For Military Troops
content: US President Donald Trump revealed that he wants to use American cities as training grounds for the armed forces and joined Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth on Tuesday in declaring an end to "woke" culture.

title: Video: Historic Church Crumbles After Massive Earthquake Hits Philippines
content: A video of a heritage church in Cebu with lights and parts of its outer facade collapsing is being shared widely on social media.

title: Karur Stampede Could Have Been Avoided If Bigger Space Was Allotted, Says Hema Malini
content: A fact-finding delegation of the NDA, led by BJP MP and actor Hema Malini, visited Karur on Tuesday to assess the circumstances surrounding the tragic stampede that claimed 41 lives during TVK Chief Vijay's rally.

title: 9 Killed In Arch Collapse At Tamil Nadu Power Plant, PM Announces Compensation
content: Nine migrant workers from Assam were killed when an under-construction coal handling enclosure collapsed at the Ennore supercritical power station on the outskirts of Chennai.

title: "Dubai Sheikh Wants Sex Partner": Delhi Baba's Shocking WhatsApp Chats
content: The arrest of self-styled godman Swami Chaitanyananda Saraswati has led to the discovery of WhatsApp chats that shed light on his alleged exploitation of young women students.

title: TVK Leader Charged For Controversial 'Gen Z' Post After Stampede
content: A senior leader of actor Vijay's Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam (TVK) has been charged over a social media post calling for Tamil Nadu's "Gen Z" youth to emulate recent protests in Nepal and rise against what he termed a "wicked government".

title: Over 1.73 Lakh Killed In Road Accidents In 2023, Overspeeding Major Cause
content: More than 1.73 lakh people were killed and 4,47,969 others were injured in road accidents across the country in 2023 with 45.8 per cent of the victims riding two wheelers.

title: Tamil Nadu seeks review of Supreme Court judgment directing teachers to qualify for TET or quit service
content: If the directions are implemented, the entire school system faces the imminent prospect of collapse, with mass disqualification of teachers and denial of classroom instruction to millions of children. This creates a direct conflict with Article 21A of the Constitution, which guarantees the fundamental right to education, Tamil Nadu argues in Supreme Court

title: Lorry topples on Chennai-Bengaluru Highway in Ambur
content: Police said the lorry was proceeding towards Koyambedu Wholesale market in Chennai from Bengaluru to deliver a consignment of onions when the driver suddenly lost control of the vehicle.

title: Maharashtra, Karnataka report most number of farmer suicides
content: Removing import restrictions, succumbing to ‚Äòtariff terrorism‚Äô will worsen the situation, warns Kisan Sabha

title: Bihar had just five cases of foreigners and passport act-related crimes in 2023: NCRB report
content: Illegal migration and infiltration have been raised as key issues ahead of the Bihar polls; according to NCRB data, in 2023, most of the cases pertaining to laws governing foreigners were registered in Bengal, followed by Tripura, Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu and Punjab

title: BJP moves to consolidate votes in Bihar, to pull out Madhya Pradesh playbook
content: Bhojpuri singer Pawan Singh, whose independent candidacy led to NDA‚Äôs defeat in Karakat in 2024 Lok Sabha elections, has been pulled back into the party fold. The party is also planning to field many senior leaders, including Union Ministers, in the Assembly polls as it did in Madhya Pradesh

title: U.P. PGT exam postponed again; aspirants, Opposition slam government‚Äôs repeated delays
content: Students allege that this is the fifth time the examination, whose notification was released in April 2022, has been postponed, citing unavoidable reasons

title: Indian Railways to launch first assured-transit container train from Delhi to Kolkata in October
content: The bi-weekly service will run from Inland Container Depot (ICD) Tughlakabad in Delhi, to CONCOR‚Äôs CTCS terminal in Kolkata via Agra and Kanpur.

title: CM says some journalists are acting as a catspaw of their corporate owners
content: Corporate-controlled media is pursuing an aggressive news agenda that sought to divide the country along religious lines to obfuscate the livelihood issues plaguing the people

title: Over 3,000 students in Tirupattur mourn Karur stampede
content: According to a press release, students also took a pledge for their commitment to safety and observed¬†a moment of silence in a tribute to the departed

title: Police initiate demolition action against properties linked to cleric‚Äôs aide
content: 16 rioters who attacked the police in Bareilly with bricks, stones, and bottles of acid were arrested by the police

title: Bridging the fighter jet gap is top priority: IAF Deputy Chief
content: We are looking at the LCA Mk2 and have also invested in the Advanced Medium Combat Aircraft, which represents the future of indigenous combat platforms. However, these projects will take time to mature. In the immediate future, we need to bridge the capability gap

title: Kerala Govt. receives nearly 18,000 petitions during human-wildlife conflict mitigation programme
content: Second phase of programme will commence on October 1. Over the next four days, the complaints will be categorised, following which district-level meetings, chaired by the Minister in-charge of districts, will be held

title: FIR filed against Maharashtra Congress over social media post¬†
content: Mumbai Police registers FIR against unidentified person for allegedly inciting violence through social media post showing BJP office on fire amidst protests

title: After controversy, CJI Bhushan Gavai‚Äôs mother undecided on being chief guest at RSS event
content: The Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh had extended an invite to Kamala Gavai for its Vijayadasami celebration which will be held in Amravati on October 5

title: India got 8% more monsoon rain this year
content: While northern India saw extremely heavy spells, causing loss of life and property, east and northeast regions got lesser rain than usual

title: KBR National Park being turned into a walkers‚Äô park, allege nature lovers
content: Designed to be a forested sanctuary in centre of Hyderabad, it is witnessing construction and landscaping¬†more suited to an urban recreation space with rows of cement blocks, hedge plantations, gazebos coming up inside the park; naturalists allege biodiversity erosion and disturbance to wildlife

title: Nine migrant workers killed, one injured in construction site accident at Ennore SEZ thermal power project
content: The workers, all from Assam, were working at a height of over 20 feet when the iron scaffolding installed for the construction of an arch collapsed; Kattur police file case, begin probe into incident

title: Heavy rush continues on ninth day of Dasara at Indrakeeladri
content: Kanaka Durga temple sees thousands of devotees flocking for darshan of the goddess in the special Durga Ashtami alankaram, while authorities ensure smooth access, prasadam distribution, and facilities for the elderly and differently-abled.

title: Splendour marks ‚ÄòSurya Prabha Vahana‚Äô seva in Tirumala
content: The processional deity of Lord Malayappa, dressed in the attire of Lord Badrinarayana, has been taken out in a grand procession, providing a visual feast to the scores of devotees

title: Bengaluru accounts for over 51% of all cybercrimes in metro cities in 2023: NCRB data
content: Among metropolitan cities, Bengaluru reported the highest number of cybercrime cases, contributing 51.92% of all cases across the 19 metros

title: Boom-and-bust cycles of sardine linked to monsoon and oceanographic changes, says CMFRI study
content: The study by CMFRI integrated fisheries biology and oceanographic data from Kochi, Vizhinjam, and Kozhikode

title: Kerala leads in chargesheeting rate but records alarming rise in suicides
content: According to data from National Crime Records Bureau for 2023,  Kerala  has reported the highest chargesheeting rate under Indian Penal Code crimes at 95.6%

title: Chief Minister announces ‚Çπ8,500 top-up over NDRF compensation for flood-hit farmers
content: The Chief Minister, who did an aerial survey, said that over 9.6 lakh hectares of crops have been damaged across the State, of which 9.03 lakh hectares were in just eight northern districts

title: Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh: A look at its origins, ideology and rise (1925-1966)
content: The RSS rose amid India‚Äôs battle to overthrow the British Raj, with the aim of establishing a ‚ÄòHindu nation‚Äô via cultural and religious revival

title: Majority of bonemeal, rubber processing units at Edayar have complied with norms, claims KSPCB
content: These 20 units were served closure or closure-intention notices for violation of environmental norms between April 2024 and January 2025 by the board

title: Andhra Pradesh Finance Department to clear bills  worth ‚Çπ400 core to small contractors
content: These bills pertain to the works completed between 2014 and 2019, and kept pending by the previous government

title: Odisha bypoll a litmus test for all three party leaders
content: The bypoll is set to shape the leadership of Odisha CM Mohan Majhi, BJD chief Naveen Patnaik, and OPCC president Bhakta Charan Das, each facing their first election in a new role

title: Over 1.73 lakh killed in road accidents in 2023; over-speeding a major cause: NCRB
content: The fatalities increased by 17,261 from the count in 2022, with two-wheelers accounting for maximum such accidents causing 79,533 deaths. Most of the deaths in two-wheeler accidents were reported in Tamil Nadu (11,490 deaths) and Uttar Pradesh (8,370 deaths).

title: HelpAge India launches ‚ÄòAdvantAge60‚Äô campaign to mark International Day of Older Persons
content: HelpAge India, a NGO working for the case of older people, on Tuesday launched its new campaign ‚ÄòAdvantAge60: Powering Aspirations ‚Äì Active, Enabled and Empowered‚Äô to mark the International Day of Older Persons 2025

title: Cancelling flag-off ceremony: show-cause notice to MVD official
content: Transport Minister had cancelled a flagging-off ceremony of vehicles procured for the Motor Vehicle department (MVD), upset over the arrangement of the programme

title: With another system forming in the Bay, isolated heavy rain likely in coastal districts of Andhra Pradesh till October 3
content: Low-pressure area forms over central parts of the Bay of Bengal on October 1, and it is likely to intensify into a depression on October 2 and cross the South Odisha-North Andhra coasts in the early hours of October 3, says India Meteorological Department

title: Refusing to vacate order staying rule capping cinema ticket price, Karnataka HC asks multiplex association to maintain accounts of amount collected on sale of tickets till issue is adjudicated
content: If the amended rule is upheld by the court, the amount collected in addition to the ‚Çπ200 cap would be refunded to the purchasers of the ticket through same electronic mode from which ticket was purchased, said the court

title: Infopark phase-III likely to be completed by 2030, says CEO
content: The ‚ÄòIntegrated AI Township‚Äô is proposed to come up in 300 acres, of which 100 acres will be used for IT businesses

title: Telangana asks Centre to ease storage crunch, raise procurement target
content: Irrigation and Civil Supplies Minister N. Uttam Kumar Reddy urges Centre to take urgent action on rice procurement and delivery rules; flags immediate storage crisis and requests Centre to immediately arrange additional space by hiring godowns or by allotting more railway rakes to move rice stocks to other States

title: Disability pension row: Delhi High Court sets aside order linking  hypertension and obesity
content: Delhi High Court orders release of disability pension to retired Army Nursing Officer, overturning Armed Forces Tribunal decision

title: Farmers, traders gain as Dasara demand lifts coconut prices in Andhra Pradesh
content: Retail coconut rates touch ‚Çπ50, while wholesale prices rise to ‚Çπ18‚Äì22. Farmers‚Äô earnings have jumped from ‚Çπ6‚Äì8 per coconut to ‚Çπ20, and traders are exporting stocks to neighbouring States

title: BJP leader who made death threat against Rahul Gandhi surrenders before police
content: Printu Mahadevan, a schoolteacher, sparked outrage after making a provocative remark that ‚Äúa bullet will be fired at Rahul Gandhi‚Äôs chest‚Äù

title: Kerala nets 13% less SW monsoon rainfall, braces for above-normal northeast monsoon
content: The long-range forecast issued by India Meteorological Department  warns of excess precipitation in Kerala during the northeast monsoon period

title: Velur becomes Kerala‚Äôs first panchayat to secure full National Legal Guardianship
content: With the launch of Thalir Buds Rehabilitation Centre and a range of welfare programmes, Velur sets a model for disability rights, self-reliance, and inclusive community care

title: Hyderabad monuments illuminated in pink to mark Breast Cancer Awareness Month
content: The Charminar, Buddha statue at Hussainsagar, Durgam Cheruvu cable bridge, T-Hub, Prasad‚Äôs and KIMS Hospital were among the landmarks illuminated

title: Works of conservative thinkers should be included curriculum to ensure debate in a polarized nation, says V-C of Kuvempu varsity
content: Why cannot we have a reading from the V.D. Savarkar‚Äôs work on First War of Independence in 1856 in the text? Just if you put certain works in the curriculum does not mean you are propagating an idea, says Sharath Ananthamurthy

title: All roads lead to Kulasekarapattinam on the eve of Dasara
content: Devotees dress up as various deities, epic characters, beggars, policemen, doctors, nurses, and other living characters during the Navarathiri celebrations. Make-up artists from Chennai are brought in for the purpose

title: Goalie guide: The goaltending timeshares to target
content: from 2009-10 to 2016-17, the average crease share of a top-12 fantasy goalie was 74.1%, with an average of 35.2 wins and 215.7 fantasy points . 25% had a goaltender with 75% creaseshare or higher and 54.2% had at least 65% .

title: Pereira was on the wrong side of UFC title history once; will that happen again?
content: ankalaev-Pereira 2 will be the first bout for both fighters since the belt changed hands . pereira dethroned pereira when they met in march . he will be aiming to regain the light heavyweight title on saturday .

title: Power Rankings: LSU drops 13 spots; BYU, Memphis and Louisville join the Top 25
content: the first full month of the 2025 college football season is officially in the books . some of the nation's biggest early-season surprises were once again on display . despite a leaky run defense, Alabama notched its latest win over Georgia on the road .

title: LeBron's future, Celtics' goals sans Tatum: Biggest question for all 30 teams
content: despite 22 days separating the preseason from opening night, not every team's offseason storylines have been resolved . how will the saga trickle into the Golden State Warriors ' season; how the LA Clippers will handle the league's investigation into Kawhi Leonard . what are the expectations for the Indiana Pacers this season are just some of the largest stories to follow .

title: Ranking winners and losers, injury impacts from Sunday
content: RB, Las Vegas Raiders : Ashton Jeanty led all running backs through the late window on Sunday . he rushed for 138 yards and a touchdown on 21 carries, plus he added two receptions for 17 yards . the rookie could see a bump in pass game usage after his production .

title: NBA media day 2025: KD's birthday wish and Jokic's jokes lead best moments
content: the new york Knicks, new Orleans pelicans, Brooklyn Nets , Phoenix Suns and Philadelphia 76ers were the first five teams to hold media days last week . the rest of the league's media days to Monday .

title: MLB wild-card round odds: The favorites for every series
content: the 2025 MLB playoffs kick off with the wild-card round . make your picks The two division winners in each league with the best records get a chance to rest their regulars and set up their rotations . each team's odds to win the series are accurate as of publish time .

title: This year was supposed to be a Dodgers coronation; instead, it's an October crapshoot
content: the defending world Series champions had emerged from free agency with the best starter on the market, the best reliever on the marketplace and the best pitching prospect in the world . they were bound to be an all-time juggernaut, top to bottom, eons beyond any of their competitors . it wasn't 117, even if the number to set the game's single-game rotation was 117.
